titleStmt.title: Arguments against all accommodation and treaties, betweene the citie of London, and the ingaged grandees of the Parliament & army. / Written by one that honours God, and loveth his King and countrey.
titleStmt.author: One that honours God, and loveth his King and countrey.

notesStmt.note: Colophon reads: Printed for H. B. 1648.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
